Posts.Content: I am 6.5 years past my treatment for Stage 3A breast cancer (surgery, chemo, radiation, more surgery) and was diagnosed this week with endometrial cancer. I've been very careful about what I eat and faithfully take my Femara. Has anyone else had this happen on Femara? I won't know the stage or prognosis until after the hysterectomy. Feeling so shell-shocked, as the gyn who did the D&C reassured me that it wasn't cancer. P.
Posts.Title: Endometrial Cancer?

Posts.Content: Thanks. Wasn't sure where to post it!
Posts.Title: Endometrial Cancer?
